```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
conflicts_india <- read_csv('relevant_data_years.csv')
```

```{r}

total_deaths_india <- conflicts_india %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarize(Best = sum(best),
            Low = sum(low),
            High = sum(high)) %>%
  mutate(
    High = High/1000,
    Low = Low/1000,
    Best = Best/1000
  )
```

plot_deaths_india <- t(total_deaths_india) %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  rownames_to_column(var = "Fatalities")

```{r}
ggplot(total_deaths_india) +
  geom_line(mapping = aes(x = year, y = Best), fill='red') +
  ylab("Fatalities (x1000)") + xlab('Estimation')
```
